jobDescription: This position is regulatory focused with expertise in consumer reporting agency products, services including consumer direct services, credit bureau reporting and data broker services as it pertains to our personal identification and credit management. This spans from pre-analysis to determine if the data received from county or 3rd party sources meet the specifics needed to be considered for inclusion. Writing the business rules utilized for programming and UAT QA, to conducting the final review to make sure the programming and QA were sufficiently done, to having expert level knowledge of our data assets and processes.  Job Duties Strong subject matter expertise in developing compliance management, privacy and data governance programs to streamline business processes and enhance operational controls.Proficiency in consumer privacy regulations, such as FCRA and GLBA.Drives decisions of business rule changes based on data content analysis.Engages with business units to evolve data into meaningful business intelligence goals.Analyzes data with basic statistical and query methods and visualization techniques, interprets results, and provides written summaries of data analyses.Document business requirements and investigate data issues and anomaliesCreate resolution requirements with the project team, internal and external stakeholdersPerform data standardization to drive meaningful business reports based on consultation and analysis of internal and external customers and product needs.Designs or creates queries to extract the desired data, formats the data and validates the results and creates/runs supporting reportsEnsures data quality and data integrity throughout the data collection process.Makes recommendations to improve data quality and availability.Helps to identify the appropriate sources of information and the business rules required to transform source data to meet customer and business intelligence needs.Gathers, compiles, analyzes and documents information on business intelligence reporting needs.Develops useful and insightful information from a variety of data sources and data models to be used in updating and advancing product capabilities.Applies
